sub_title: IT Operations, Agile, Strategy, Change Management, Digital transformation
summary:
IT Servant Leader, I started as a developer/software engineer at a bank, transferred to a Software Development Company with ERP/Accounting/CRM software. Trained i-series RPG developers. Switched to Retail and Supply Chain and grew to a Director function. After that started as an Independent Interim manager.
During my career, I've been able to get involved with many ways of working on projects and have experienced a lot of insights, when reading about Agile frameworks I got enthusiastic about it and recognized a lot of common grounds with projects I have been part of. I have been able to assist organizations to embrace and implement a way of working that helps proper workflow or happy flow when using Agile. The eye-opener for me has been that I’ve practiced a lot of help in my career as with Insights it revealed me as the Helper, a person who helps to remove impediments and supports and facilitates the organization, with this I've helped projects but also people to grow, and when people grow, we grow together.

Project Lead for E-commerce implementation in 17 countries, Portal Implementations, RFID research, GDPR, SOX, IT Governance, Monitoring of E-commerce, Server Monitoring, Hardware monitoring, Process monitoring, Digital Transformation, Agile, Jira, Service Now, Mobile Devices, Asana, Large implementations, R&D, Work from vision, to a strategy which results in tactics and ultimately operations.

profile_positions.description:
Running temporary IT departments, i can help define a strategy of Build and Run,
Setup the proper procurement to find the right solutions for the right price.
Making sure that the environment is safe, inside governance is as important as outside governance.
Create the proper workflow and alignment, get the data in the right place, remove any blockers and build the right monitor to detect any odds that can severe your business.

company.name: Bookboon – the World’s most used Corporate Learning Solution

profile_positions.description: Writing a learning book about project management.
profile_positions.title: Schrijver

profile_positions.description:
Working for a SAAS solution company  that is going from Startup to Scale-up.
We improved the Portal application and with a partner improved the Digital Mobile application (iOS & Android). User activation was integrated with Azure AD Security. Due to remote working (C-19) we revised the collaboration tools and switched to ASANA to improve the Agile workflow, conforming with Safe frameworks, MS Teams became vital for meetings with customers, outsource partners, and internal in the organization. 
Migrating the backend from SQL to Python and Big Data with an outsourcing partner. Onboarding customers with their data in the Retailisation backend by setting up standard Data migration for the ETL. Outsourced main IT as the core for Retailisation is to develop solutions for Inventory management. With the IT outsource partner we introduced tighter security, i.e., introducing Two Factor Authorization, Cloud security, and improved CI/CD and secured Data transportation.
profile_positions.title: Head Of Information Technology (interim)

profile_positions.description:
Working for a SAAS solution company that is going from Startup to Scale-up.
Improved customer success, improved learning base with the knowledge base. Set up monitoring and escalation so day to day operations run smoother. Onboard new customers with a quick project approach to setup data flow.
Helped to bring new functionality to implementation so customers have predictive instead of reactive data.
profile_positions.title: Head of Operations (interim)

profile_positions.description:
I worked for a Belgian lingerie firm (production, wholesale, and own retail) that is going through a digital transformation. I was responsible for all change and development (3 SCRUM teams) on the corporate side. This is being executed in a SCRUM/Agile way (with Jira) to support large projects and implementations. 
On top, I managed 4 external consultants and 2 Project managers. This team was there to support the ERP upgrade, the 2nd PM was hired to roll out GDPR/AVG.    
The overall company was going through the transition using LEAN as a method, transition from traditional business pillars to Value Streams. With the business teams, we streamlined requirements and made a Strategic plan to create a better overview of outstanding business requirements. Outside of the Digital transformation the company also introduced their own online sales channels for their brands, the 3 SCRUM teams were vital in the support and integration into all back end systems.
profile_positions.title: IT Manager Change (Interim)

profile_positions.description: I had a team of consultants that serviced various customers, startup of Retail Consultancy at CGI.  Initial project to onboard a large retailer with services in IT for their US market incl. Helpdesk.
profile_positions.title: Director of Consulting Services Retail

profile_positions.description: My game was to provide with five teams (45 people)  support for – Retail ERP for End users in the EHQ (SOX responsible) – Digital software for the .com business – Store application support – Cross-functional team to support the Stores – a Monitoring team that is part of a follow the sun structure and does Critical Incident Management when needed. Improved Services in the last 2 years with improved monitoring and improved Retail Services (new Call Center and new on-site support with a depot service model).
profile_positions.title: Director Production Support Retail

volunteer_experiences.role: Head referee - North Sea Beach and EBRA Referee commitee member
volunteer_experiences.description:
EBRA - setting standards for all members with regards to Beach 5 rules and following up on the execution of those standards. 
https://www.beach-rugby.eu/ 


North Sea beach Rugby is a annual tournament and part of the EBRA. We deliver a 2 day tournament with lots of volunteers to create a exciting tournament for also non Rugby lovers. The game is easy to understand and full of action and entertainment! My role is to provide referees (25 in 2017) and be part of the game management during the tournament.  Exciting and intense but rewarding!
http://northseabeachrugby.com/
Development of referees within the club, start up collaboration with all club members to create referees for now and the near future.
Giving courses to volunteers who want to start as rugby referee. Learning by doing, activation of mindsets.
